text: Çolpan İlhan (August 8, 1936, İzmir – July 25, 2014, Istanbul) was a Turkish movie and theatre actress. She was awarded the title of 'State artist of Turkey". She acted in more than 300 movies and theatre plays. İlhan died of a heart attack at her home in Istanbul. Her funeral ceremony was scheduled for 27 July 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Turkish actors Category:People from İzmir
title: Çolpan İlhan
